definition: variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: Next week, leaders of theworldworld's largest economies will meet in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 下周，世界经济大国会在宾夕凡尼亚州的匹兹堡会谈。

sentences.english: The cameraman and sound recordist were mugged on their last day in Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 摄影师和录音师在匹兹堡的最后一天遭到了持枪劫掠。

sentences.english: Black and yellow are the colors of the city's football team, the Pittsburgh Steelers.
sentences.chinese: 黑色和黄色是城市的橄榄球队，匹兹堡钢人队的颜色。

sentences.english: For many years, Pittsburgh was considered the steel capital of the world.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，匹兹堡被认为是世界钢都。

sentences.english: Pittsburgh was a perfect venue for this work.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面，以匹兹堡作为会议地点适逢其会。

sentences.english: He is an assistant professor in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 马修是匹兹堡大学精神科的一位助理教授。

sentences.english: A Pittsburgher invented a popular dessert, the banana split.
sentences.chinese: 一位匹兹堡人发明了有名的餐后甜点，香蕉船。

sentences.english: Many of the leading businessmen of Pittsburgh had a serious responsibility thrust upon them at the very threshold of their career.
sentences.chinese: 匹兹堡有许多大企业家在创业之初都肩负过重任。

sentences.english: Pittsburghers prefabricated and erected the stainless steel St. Louis "Gateway Arch."
sentences.chinese: 匹兹堡人预制并架起了不锈钢圣路易斯“拱门”。

sentences.english: The third G20 Summit has kicked off in Pittsburg.
sentences.chinese: 第三届G20峰会在匹兹堡开幕。

sentences.english: Here was another example of a talented young person leaving Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这是有天赋的青年离开匹兹堡的又一个例子。

sentences.english: PIB adheres to amyloid plaques in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 匹兹堡化合物B结合在脑组织淀粉样斑点上。

sentences.english: The hometown team, Los Angeles Lakers, won the Espy for Best Team edging out a close Pittsburgh Steelers team.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶湖人队击败匹兹堡钢人队获最佳团队奖。

sentences.english: Summer time in Pittsburgh is time to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 在匹兹堡夏令时间的时候到户外工作。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the play of Pittsburgh's group of quarterbacks will also merit watching on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 同时，匹兹堡的四分卫组的比赛将在周六也值得关注。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
